mapper.select: select PRO_CPRTN_ANSWER_NO, PRO_CPRTN_BBSCTT_NO, PRO_CPRTN_ANSWER_CN, PRO_CPRTN_ANSWER_WR_DT, PRO_ID from PRO_CPRTN_ANSWER where PRO_CPRTN_BBSCTT_NO = #{proCprtnBbscttNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRO_CPRTN_ANSWER(PRO_CPRTN_ANSWER_NO, PRO_CPRTN_BBSCTT_NO, PRO_CPRTN_ANSWER_CN, PRO_CPRTN_ANSWER_WR_DT, PRO_ID) VALUES(#{proCprtnAnswerNo},#{proCprtnBbscttNo},#{proCprtnAnswerCn},#{proCprtnAnswerWrDt},#{proId})
mapper.select: /* kr.or.ddit.board.pro_collabo.mapper.ProCprtnBbscttMapper list 페이징 수정 */ WITH TOTAL_COUNT AS ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_COUNT FROM PRO_CPRTN_BBSCTT ), T AS ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY F.PRO_CPRTN_BBSCTT_NO ASC) AS RNUM , F.PRO_CPRTN_BBSCTT_NO , F.PRO_CPRTN_BBSCTT_SJ , F.PRO_CPRTN_BBSCTT_CN , F.PRO_CPRTN_BBSCTT_WR_DT , F.PRO_CPRTN_BBSCTT_RDCNT , F.PRO_ID , B.USER_NCNM , C.PRO_PROFL_PHOTO FROM PRO_CPRTN_BBSCTT F JOIN USERS B ON F.PRO_ID = B.USER_ID JOIN PRO C ON B.USER_ID = C.PRO_ID WHERE 1 = 1 ) SELECT T.* , CEIL((SELECT TOTAL_COUNT FROM TOTAL_COUNT) / 10.0) AS TOTAL_PAGES , (SELECT TOTAL_COUNT FROM TOTAL_COUNT) AS TOTAL_COUNT FROM T WHERE 1 = 1 AND T.RNUM BETWEEN ((SELECT TOTAL_COUNT FROM TOTAL_COUNT) - 10 * #{currentPage} + 1) AND (SELECT TOTAL_COUNT FROM TOTAL_COUNT) - 10 * (#{currentPage} - 1) ORDER BY T.PRO_CPRTN_BBSCTT_WR_DT DESC, T.RNUM DESC

SELECT A.PRO_CPRTN_BBSCTT_NO, A.PRO_CPRTN_BBSCTT_SJ, A.PRO_CPRTN_BBSCTT_CN,
A.PRO_CPRTN_BBSCTT_RDCNT, A.SPRVISE_ATCHMNFL_NO, A.PRO_ID, B.PRO_MBTLNUM, B.SEXDSTN_TY, B.EMAIL, B.PRO_PROFL_PHOTO, B.SPCLTY_REALM_CODE, C.PRO_PROFL_ON_LI_INTRCN, C.PRO_PROFL_CONTACT_POSBL_TIME, C.PRO_PROFL_REQ_FORM, C.PRO_PROFL_HIST, C.BCITY_CODE, C.BRTC_CODE FROM PRO_CPRTN_BBSCTT A inner JOIN PRO B ON A.PRO_ID = B.PRO_ID inner JOIN PRO_PROFL C ON A.PRO_ID = C.PRO_ID where PRO_CPRTN_BBSCTT_NO = #{proCprtnBbscttNo}

SELECT A.PRO_CPRTN_BBSCTT_NO, A.PRO_CPRTN_BBSCTT_SJ, A.PRO_CPRTN_BBSCTT_CN, A.PRO_CPRTN_BBSCTT_WR_DT, A.PRO_CPRTN_BBSCTT_RDCNT , A.SPRVISE_ATCHMNFL_NO, A.PRO_ID , B.USER_NCNM , C.PRO_PROFL_PHOTO from PRO_CPRTN_BBSCTT A, USERS B, PRO C where PRO_CPRTN_BBSCTT_NO = #{proCprtnBbscttNo} AND A.PRO_ID = B.USER_ID AND B.USER_ID = C.PRO_ID
